subject: Baseball
Little League World Series
Little League
lead_paragraph: John Cornett hit the ball high and hard, but center fielder Michael Rando made a leaping catch at the wall with two outs in the bottom of the sixth inning for Walpole, Mass., to preserve a 3-2 victory against Hamilton, Ohio, in the Little League World Series in South Williamsport, Pa.In other games, Tokyo scored six runs in the third inning to overcome a 3-0 deficit and defeat Willemstad, Curaçao, 10-3; and Warner Robins, Ga., beat Lake Oswego, Ore., 9-4. Maricaibo, Venezuela, edged Taichung, Taiwan, 2-1, when Miguel Romero doubled in a run with two outs in the bottom of the sixth.
